com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase

Class HBaseClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.HBaseClientFactory

  • public class HBaseClientFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating and managing HBaseClient instances.

    The implementation of the HBaseClient is determined by the HBaseClientConfiguration.

    The resulting HBaseClient will have its lifecycle managed by the Environment and will have HealthChecks installed for the .META. and -ROOT- tables.

    See Also:
    HBaseClient
